title: The King's General
description: Alternate cover available here.Honor Harris is only 18 when she first meets Richard Grenvile, proud, recklessâ€”and utterly captivating. But following a riding accident, Honor must reconcile herself to a life alone. As Richard rises through the ranks of the army, marries and makes enemies, Honor remains true to him, and finally discovers the secret of Menabilly.
author: Daphne du Maurier
